item.subitem: The smart stethoscope is one of the devices of eWALL for monitoring the status of the heart.
It measures the heart rate as well as heart performance.
Pres the "Start" button of the Smart Stethoscope and press it against your chest, close by the heart.
Press "START MEASUREMENT" button on the screen.
The Oximeter measuring and displaying functional oxygen saturation of arterial hemoglobin (% SpO<sub>2</sub>) and heart rate.
Insert your finger, nail side up, into the Oximeter until the fingertip touches the built-in stop guide.
When a finger is inserted, the device performs a brief startup sequence. Verify that all LEDs illuminate during the startup sequence.
Press "START MEASUREMENT" button on the screen.
The device measures your blood pressure and heart rate simply and quickly.
You can wrap the cuff either on your right or left arm. Apply the cuff so that the air tube is at the side of your elbow.
Select your user ID (A or B).
Press the O/I START button. All symbols appear on the display. The user ID symbol you selected flashes on the display.
Press "START MEASUREMENT" button on the screen.
